TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates a new MSBuild script to deploy DNN extension locally.

TemplateFiles.File: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Project xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003" ToolsVersion="4.0" DefaultTargets="Build"> <Target Name="DoLocalDeploy" Condition=" '$(Configuration)' == 'Debug' "> <!-- Declare binaries --> <ItemGroup> <LocalDeployBinaryFiles Include="$(MainProjectOutputPath)\${SolutionName}*.dll" /> <LocalDeployBinaryFiles Include="$(MainProjectOutputPath)\${SolutionName}*.pdb" /> </ItemGroup> <!-- Declare resource files --> <ItemGroup> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.ascx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.aspx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.asmx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.ashx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.resx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.css" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.html" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.htm" Exclude="..\${SolutionName}\license.htm;..\${SolutionName}\releaseNotes.htm" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.xml" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.xsl" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.xslt" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.resx" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.js" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.jpg" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.png" /> <LocalDeployResourceFiles Include="..\**\*.gif" /> </ItemGroup> <!-- Declare excluded files --> <ItemGroup> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\packages\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\${ProjectName}\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\.git\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\.svn\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\*\bin\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\*\obj\**\*" /> <LocalDeployExcludeFiles Include="..\*\_ReSharper*\**\*" /> </ItemGroup> <!-- Apply excluded files filters --> <ItemGroup> <LocalDeployResourceFilteredFiles Include="@(LocalDeployResourceFiles)" Exclude="@(LocalDeployExcludeFiles)" /> </ItemGroup> <!-- Copy binaries --> <Copy SourceFiles="@(LocalDeployBinaryFiles)" DestinationFolder="$(DnnLocalDeployPath)\bin" SkipUnchangedFiles="true" /> <!-- Copy filtered Resource files --> <Copy SourceFiles="@(LocalDeployResourceFilteredFiles)" DestinationFolder="$(DnnLocalDeployPath)\DesktopModules\${SolutionName}\%(RecursiveDir)" SkipUnchangedFiles="true" /> </Target> </Project>
